page.title: 15SPORTS CENTRES (2)
page.content: The nearest sports centre to where I live is the George H. Carnall Centre. I sometimes go there with my friend Jillian to do "pop mobility". They do other things as well like Karate, squash,badmington, weight training and basketball. They are also building a swimming pool there. At Sale sports Centre they do things in the summer holidays for children. The nearest swimming baths to where I live is near The Curzon. It is quite an old baths and they give swimming lessons there. At Sale they give you a coloured band. When your coloured light shines you have to get out. They have a small pool for beginners and a big pool, with four diving boards. In the gym in the George H. Carnell Centre they have an exercise bike, a lot of weights, changing rooms and showers. Stretford has a sports centre too.
